title: Add backend API to fetch canonical Customer_Analyzer positioning block + version metadata for staleness checks

sections.text: Implement a Sales_Accelerator service endpoint that, given an account/opportunity ID, returns the latest Customer_Analyzer positioning block content plus stable identifier/version and last-updated timestamp. This unblocks reliable stale-vs-latest comparisons and the “Replace with latest from Customer_Analyzer” action without relying on manually pasted text as a source of truth. Include error handling for missing/unauthorized CA data and cache responses briefly to avoid repeated CA calls during edit flows.
